requirement_text: WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance for public-facing content
Disaster Recovery RTO<=4h, RPO<=1h for CMS
Zero-trust access with SSO (OIDC) and RBAC
Data residency within Australia for all content and backups
Provide three relevant public sector case studies
Detailed migration plan from legacy CMS including content audit
Performance: p95 page render < 500ms under 500 RPS
Continuous delivery pipeline with test automation coverage >= 70%
Information retention in line with agency records policy
Monthly service reporting on SLAs and KPIs
Comply with page limits and formatting rules in submission
